---
layout: post
title: "Project Euler: Problem 8 - Product of Consecutive Digits"
date: 2012-08-25 18:51
comments: true
categories: [powerhell, projecteuler]
published: false
---

``` ps1 Find the greatest product of five consecutive digits in the 1000-digit number.
$text = ""

function Split-Number {
  param([string]$value)
  $index = 0
  while($index -lt $value.Length - 4) {
    $value.Substring($index++, 5)
  }
}

filter Evaluate-String {
  $_.ToCharArray() | % { [int]::Parse($_) } | % {$total = 1} {$total *= $_} {$total}
}

(Split-Number $text | Evaluate-String | Measure-Object -Maximum).Maximum

# The Answer
40824
```
